column2: "Na EWURADZE yii noho kyerɛɛ Abram wɔ Mamre nsudur nkyɛn
column3: ewia ketee a ɔtse n’asesee abowano no;"
na ɔhwɛe
column4: na
column6: mbarimba baasa gyina ne tsentsendo. Na aber a ohun hɔn no
column7: otutuu mbirika fii n’asesee abowano kehyiaa hɔn kwan

column3: Mo wura
column4: sɛ afei menya w’enyim enyimnyam a

column3: na hom nhohor hom anan ho
column4: na hom ngye hom ahom wɔ dua yi ase:"

column2: "na monkɔ nkɛfa edziban trɔma bi mbra ma hom mfa nhyɛ hom akoma dzen; na n’ekyir no hom akɔ: susuampa dɛ hom aba hom akowaa nkyɛn yi. Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Yɛ dɛ mbrɛ aka no ara."

column2: "Na Abraham kaa noho kɔr asese no mu Sara hɔ
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Yɛ isiam pa etwadze ebiasa krado ntsɛntsɛm

column2: "Na Abraham tutuu enguan kɔr no mbowakuw mu
column3: na ɔkɛfaa nantwiba a ɔyɛ mberɛw na oye
column4: na ɔdze maa ɔsomfo; na ɔyɛɛ ntsɛm kɛyɛɛ edziban."

column3: nye merekye
column4: nye nantwiba a ɔdze ayɛ edziban no
column5: na ɔdze besii hɔn enyim: na ogyinaa hɔn nkyɛn wɔ dua no ase

column3: Wo yer Sara wɔ hen? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hwɛ

column3: Ampaara dɛ mebɛsan aba wo nkyɛn afedan sisei; na
column4: hwɛ
column5: wo yer Sara benya babanyin. Nna Sara ritsie wɔ asese abow a ɔwɔ n’ekyir no mu."

column3: na woedzi mfe ara yie; na adze a ɔyɛ mbaa no
column4: etwa wɔ Sara ho."

column2: "Na Sara sereew noara no mu see dɛ
column3: Aso mayɛ aberwa yi n’ekyir na mibenya enyigye
column4: mo wura so ayɛ akɔdaa yi a?"

column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na Sara serewee see dɛ
column4: Aso ampaara dɛ mayɛ aberwa yi mobɔwo ba?"

column2: "Ana biribi yɛ dzen ma EWURADZE a? Aber a mahyɛ no mebɛsan maba wo nkyɛn afedan sisei
column3: na Sara benya babanyin."
Mannserew bi; osiandɛ osuroi. Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Dabida

column3: na wɔdaan hɔn enyi kɔr Sodom do: na Abraham kegyaa hɔn kwan."
Ana medze dza merebɛyɛ no bosuma Abraham?"
ampaara Abraham bɛyɛ ɔman a ɔso na ɔwɔ tum
column4: na no mu na wobehyira asaase amanaman nyinara."

column3: ama ɔaahyɛ ne mba nye ne fifo a wodzi n’ekyir
column4: ma woeesie EWURADZE no kwan
column5: wɔayɛ pɛrpɛr nye atsɛmbu; ama EWURADZE dze dza ɔaka no wɔ Abraham ho no aaba mu."

column3: ɔnam dɛ Sodom nye Gomora ho nkekamu ayɛ kɛse; na hɔn bɔn ayɛ dur dodow ntsi;"

column2: "afei mibesian akɔhwɛ kyerɛ dɛ ɔayɛ dɛ mbrɛ nkekamu a edu me nkyɛn no tse no ewie; na sɛ ɔnntse dɛm so a
column3: mubohu."

column2: "Na mbarimba beenu no daan hɔnho fii hɔ dɛ wɔrokɔ Sodom: na Abraham dze
column3: ɔdaa ho ara gyinaa EWURADZE n’enyim."
na obisaa dɛ
column4: Ana edze atseneneefo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo nyinara bɔbɔ mu ahyew hɔn?"

column2: "Egyangyanbiara atseneneefo eduonum wɔ kurow no mu ɛ: onnkesian atseneneefo eduonum a wɔwɔ mu no ntsi ma edze efir kurow no
column3: na ebɛhyew no?"

column2: "Iyi mpar wo dɛ ebɛyɛ no dɛm
column3: dɛ edze atseneneefo bɛka ndzebɔnyɛfo ho eku hɔn
column4: ma atseneneefo ayɛ dɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo; iyi mpar wo: ana asaase nyinara ɔtsɛmbuafo nnkɛyɛ dza ɔtsen bi a?"

column3: Sɛ muhu atseneneefo eduonum wɔ Sodom kurow no mu a
column4: ɔno osian hɔn ntsi medze bɛkyɛ bea no nyinara."

column3: Afei hwɛ
column4: emi a meyɛ dɛtse nye nso
column5: na mesi mo bo dɛ mebɛkasa akyerɛ EWURADZE yi:"

column2: "egyangyanbiara atseneneefo eduonum no hɔn mu enum fi mu ɛ: ana osian enum a efi mu no ntsi ebɛsɛɛ kurow no nyinara? Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Sɛ muhu eduanan enum wɔ hɔ a
column4: mennkɛsɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔdaa ho ara kasaa kyerɛɛ no bio
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Egyangyanbiara eduanan na wobohu hɔn wɔ hɔ ɛ. Na ɔsee dɛ

column3: Mma mma EWURADZE no bo mmfuw
column4: na menkasa: egyangyanbiara eduasa na wobohu hɔn wɔ hɔ ɛ. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Sɛ muhu eduasa wɔ hɔ a

column3: Afei hwɛ
column4: mesi mo bo dɛ mebɛkasa akyerɛ EWURADZE: egyangyanbiara eduonu na wobohu hɔn wɔ hɔ ɛ: Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Osian eduonu no ntsi mennkɛsɛɛ no."

column3: Ao mma mma EWURADZE no bo mmfuw
column4: na menkasa prɛko pɛ yi ara: egyangyanbiara du na wobohu hɔn wɔ hɔ ɛ; Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Osian du no ntsi mennkɛsɛɛ no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE wiee dɛ ɔnye Abraham kasa ara na ɔkɔr no kwan: na Abraham sanee baa ne tsenabea."
